thoughts.text: The 'google' command returned several scientific articles on the potential risks of consuming seafood caught in the Pacific Ocean after the release of treated nuclear wastewater from the Fukushima Dai'ichi nuclear power plant. I want to read one of these articles to get a better understanding of the potential risks, so I will use the 'browse_website' command to visit the website of the Journal of Disaster Research and read their article on this topic.
